cyclone.name: ELSA
cyclone.current_location: about 475 mi ESE of Isla Beata, Dominican Republic
cyclone.trajectory: Tracking quickly west-northwest across the eastern and central Caribbean Sea, forecast to slow and turn northwest toward southern Hispaniola late Saturday, then near Jamaica and eastern Cuba Sunday–Monday

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Windward Islands westward to southern Hispaniola, Jamaica, and Cuba
weather_observation.rain_fall_above_4_inch: Unlikely (localized 5 inch possible but not widespread)
weather_observation.wind: Brief gusty winds possible; tropical-storm-force winds unlikely (<34 kt, 3% probability)
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches of rain with isolated spots near 5 inches could trigger localized flash flooding and minor mudslides
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along north-facing beaches
